00026 #ifndef __SCREEN_H_
00027 #define __SCREEN_H_
00028 
00029 #include "Vector.nxc"
00030 
00031 #define NXT_SCREEN_ROWS   8
00032 #define NXT_SCREEN_COLS   11
00033 #define NXT_CHAR_HEIGHT   8
00034 #define NXT_CHAR_LENGTH   8
00035 #define NXT_SCREEN_X      110
00036 #define NXT_SCREEN_Y      64
00037 
00038 #define PLOT_TYPE_LINE    1
00039 #define PLOT_TYPE_POINT   2
00040 #define PLOT_TYPE_CIRCLE  3
00041 #define PLOT_TYPE_SQUARE  4
00042 
00043 struct Plotter
00044 {
00045     long lastX;
00046     long lastY;
00047     long minX;
00048     long maxX;
00049     long minY;
00050     long maxY;
00051     int plotType;
00052 };
00053 
00054 mutex screenMutex;
00055 bool screenInitialized = 0;
00056 int screen_row = 0;
00057 string screen_TextBuffer[];
00058 
00059 /* Private function. Initializes the screen on first screen function call */
00060 void ScreenInit()
00061 {
00062     Acquire(screenMutex);
00063     ClearScreen();
00064     ArrayInit(screen_TextBuffer, " ", NXT_SCREEN_ROWS);
00065     screenInitialized = 1;
00066     Release(screenMutex);
00067 }
00068 
00072 void ScreenClear()
00073 {
00074     Acquire(screenMutex);
00075     ClearScreen();
00076     screen_row = 0;
00077     Release(screenMutex);
00078 }
00079 
00080 /* Private function. Scrolls the the screen by one line */
00081 void ScreenScroll()
00082 {
00083     Acquire(screenMutex);
00084     while (screen_row >= NXT_SCREEN_ROWS)
00085     {
00086         /* Scroll */
00087         ClearScreen();
00088         for (int i = 1; i < NXT_SCREEN_ROWS; i++)
00089         {
00090             int j = i - 1;
00091             string data = screen_TextBuffer[i];
00092             screen_TextBuffer[j] = data;
00093             int y = (NXT_SCREEN_ROWS - j - 1) * NXT_CHAR_HEIGHT;
00094             TextOut(0, y, data, false);
00095         }
00096         screen_row--;
00097     }
00098     Release(screenMutex);
00099 }
00100 
00104 void PrintText(string text, int waitTime)
00105 {
00106     Acquire(screenMutex);
00107     if (screenInitialized == 0) ScreenInit();
00108     if (screen_row >= NXT_SCREEN_ROWS) ScreenScroll();
00109     screen_TextBuffer[screen_row] = text;
00110     int y = ((NXT_SCREEN_ROWS - 1 - screen_row) * NXT_CHAR_HEIGHT);
00111     TextOut(0, y, text, false);
00112     screen_row++;
00113     if (waitTime > 0) Wait(waitTime);
00114     Release(screenMutex);
00115 }
00116 
00120 void PrintNum(long num, int waitTime)
00121 {
00122     Acquire(screenMutex);
00123     if (screenInitialized == 0) ScreenInit();
00124     if (screen_row >= NXT_SCREEN_ROWS) ScreenScroll();
00125     screen_TextBuffer[screen_row] = NumToStr(num);
00126     int y = ((NXT_SCREEN_ROWS - 1 - screen_row) * NXT_CHAR_HEIGHT);
00127     NumOut(0, y, num, false);
00128     screen_row++;
00129     if (waitTime > 0) Wait(waitTime);
00130     Release(screenMutex);
00131 }
00132 
00137 void Print(string format, long num, int waitTime)
00138 {
00139     Acquire(screenMutex);
00140     if (screenInitialized == 0) ScreenInit();
00141     if (screen_row >= NXT_SCREEN_ROWS) ScreenScroll();
00142     screen_TextBuffer[screen_row] = formatNum(format, num);
00143     int y = ((NXT_SCREEN_ROWS - 1 - screen_row) * NXT_CHAR_HEIGHT);
00144     TextOut(0, y, screen_TextBuffer[screen_row], false);
00145     screen_row++;
00146     if (waitTime > 0) Wait(waitTime);
00147     Release(screenMutex);
00148 }
00149 
00154 void PlotterInit(Plotter &plotter, int plotType,
00155                  long minX, long maxX, long minY, long maxY)
00156 {
00157     plotter.minX = minX;
00158     plotter.maxX = maxX;
00159     plotter.minY = minY;
00160     plotter.maxY = maxY;
00161     plotter.lastX = 0;
00162     plotter.lastY = 0;
00163     plotter.plotType = plotType;
00164 }
00165 
00169 void PlotterPlot(Plotter &plotter, long x, long y)
00170 {
00171      Acquire(screenMutex);
00172      x = (x - plotter.minX) * NXT_SCREEN_X / (plotter.maxX - plotter.minX);
00173      y = (y - plotter.minY) * NXT_SCREEN_Y / (plotter.maxY - plotter.minY);
00174 
00175      if (plotter.plotType != PLOT_TYPE_LINE)
00176      {
00177          if (x < NXT_SCREEN_X && y > 0)
00178          {
00179              if (plotter.plotType == PLOT_TYPE_CIRCLE)
00180                  CircleOut(x, y, 2, false);
00181              else if (plotter.plotType == PLOT_TYPE_POINT)
00182                  PointOut(x, y, false);
00183              else if (plotter.plotType == PLOT_TYPE_SQUARE)
00184                  RectOut(x, y, 2, 2, false);
00185          }
00186      }
00187      if (x > NXT_SCREEN_X) x = NXT_SCREEN_X;
00188      if (y < 0) y = 0;
00189 
00190      if (plotter.plotType == PLOT_TYPE_LINE && plotter.lastX != 0 && plotter.lastY != 0)
00191          LineOut(plotter.lastX, plotter.lastY, x, y, false);
00192 
00193      plotter.lastX = x;
00194      plotter.lastY = y;
00195      Release(screenMutex);
00196 }
00197 
00201 void PlotterPlotVector(Plotter &plotter, Vector &vec)
00202 {
00203      PlotterPlot(plotter, vec.x, vec.y);
00204 }

00208 void TestScreen()
00209 {
00210      PrintText("some text1", 500);
00211      PrintText("some text2", 500);
00212      PrintText("some text3", 500);
00213      PrintText("some text4", 500);
00214      PrintText("some text5", 500);
00215      PrintText("some text6", 500);
00216      PrintText("some text7", 500);
00217      PrintText("some text8", 500);
00218      PrintText("some text9", 500);
00219      PrintText("some text10", 500);
00220      PrintText("some text11", 500);
00221      PrintNum(2341, 500);
00222      PrintNum(2342, 500);
00223      PrintNum(2343, 500);
00224      PrintNum(2344, 500);
00225      PrintNum(2345, 500);
00226      Print("Format: %d", 501, 500);
00227      Print("Format: %d", 502, 500);
00228      Print("Format: %d", 503, 500);
00229      Print("Format: %d", 504, 500);
00230      Wait(2000);
00231 }
